name: JayTechInc
tag_list: software, custom-software, web-design, web-development, hardware-sales, pos, pos-solutions, pos-software, consulting, microsoft-training, barcodes-scanners-servers, receipt-printers, e-commerce-websites
overview:
Jay Technologies is a leading Montreal company specializing in website design, website development, custom enterprise software development, Point of sale solutions and POS hardware. Jay Technologies inc. offers a wide array of solutions customized for a range of businesses in diversified industries.

We recommend and implement on the best online strategy for businesses. We provide conceptual, functional and presentational development for businesses using the latest technology for web design and website development, including the most effective software applications development.

Combining diverse expertise in business strategy, technology, usability and design, Jay Technologies delivers increased productivity to your business with cost effective software solutions.

Contact us to learn more about our IT Services:

Hardware Sales, Web Design and Web Development E-Commerce Software POS Solutions Consulting Networking Microsoft Certified Training
